reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice scent and texture.
reviews.reviewText: These shaving creams were stocking stuffers for Christmas. Husband absolutely loved the scents and texture which he said was “silky smooth”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must be good
reviews.reviewText: I brought this for my husband for Christmas last year and when he ran out he ask me to order some more so it must be good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very useful for travel
reviews.reviewText: I LIKE the cream for shaving, and love the package size when traveling.Four stars, not five, because I LOVE another shave cream product better -- Shave Butter.But that's only available in a huge tube, too big for a carryon and TSA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great and a little goes a long way
reviews.reviewText: Scent is very subtle so you don't have to worry about it being overpowering when you're lathering it up. We travel a lot and this was the best option I could find for shaving cream that is compact and does a very good job of lathering up (just enough, not like the foam in a big can) to give you a smooth and close shave. Doesn't take up hardly any room and these should last a few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're looking for a good product here it is
reviews.reviewText: This kit is great the only downside was there was no sent option. It's a sweet Orange sent and it's not over powering so I don't mind it at all. The razor is a very nice piece. I'm a fan of straight razors and have been for many years now. I like the long disposable blade razors. I get a much better lineup and closer shave than the safety razor blades used in other straight razors. The razor is a great weight and easy to manage with one hand. The blades comes with 10 double sided long blades. That can be broke in half or flipped so it's like 20. I get 2 to 4 shaves per side. My favorite part of the kit Is the pre shave oil. Just great. The aftershave leaves a smooth shave even smoother lol. You get 2 tubes of shave cream and 1 shaving soap. I recommend a good brush and soap dish to go with the shave soap. It can be used without but why not do it right. Overall love the quality of all the products and for what they cost you can't go wrong. I hope they come out with different scents but if not I'll still purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel
reviews.reviewText: Nice size for travel. First order had manufacturing issue in tube not sealed but second set fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel!
reviews.reviewText: Love these small tubes for trips. They don't take up space and are easy to take thru security. The scents are okay tho I generally prefer unscented. The cream is thick, similarto Cremo and similar products, so I only needed to squeeze out an inch at a time. That amount makes the tube last about 7 to 10 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hubs is…
reviews.reviewText: My husband is VERY happy with this set. I was ordering another popular brand one that was more than this one and he needed some for a flight and I didn’t have time to wait soI ordered this and it was a happy surprise. I will order this for him again..wish I could find a large tube.
